question: Based on the hospital patient chart, which department had the most patients on Day 3?

options.A: Emergency department had the most patients
options.B: Outpatient department had the most patients
options.C: Surgery department had the most patients
options.D: Cannot be determined from the chart as shown

explanation: The y‑axis is truncated to 50–300 while the stacked totals for each day exceed 300. This means upper segments (e.g., part of Surgery/Outpatient) are clipped outside the plotting area, so the visible heights do not represent full values. Because some portions are not shown, we cannot reliably determine which department truly has the most patients on Day 3 from the visualization alone.
